translation.en: Wills and Kate most popular Royals ever.
This is getting out of hand.
If we're not careful, the great British scum is going to want
translation.ko: 신경을 쓰지 않으면 우리는 아예 지워지겠어요

translation.en: to skip a generation!
Nonsense, Camilla. When I meet the people, they love me.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼, 커밀라 사람들은 날 좋아한다고

translation.en: Why else would all those children keep giving you flowers?
translation.ko: 아니라면 왜 아이들이 계속 내게 꽃을 주겠어?

translation.en: Because they're getting a day off school, you idiot!
translation.ko: 덕분에 학교 안 가니까요 바보 같긴!

translation.en: Well, I think they love me.
And anyway, the line's very clear. First me, then William, but me first.
translation.ko: 그리고 왕위 계승 서열은 어차피 윌리엄보다 내가 위야

translation.en: The sheep don't care about that.
translation.ko: 사람들은 그런 거 신경 안 써요

translation.en: They'll have us out faster than a homophobic Big Brother contestant.
translation.ko: 우리를 동성애 공포증 독재자보다 빨리 버릴걸요

translation.en: And then, everything I've been through, the walkabouts, the smiling,
translation.ko: 제가 여태 국민들을 만나고 미소를 짓고

translation.en: the talking to Joe Pasquale at the Royal Variety Show,
translation.ko: 왕실 버라이어티 쇼에서 조 파스콸레와 떠든 것도

translation.en: it'll all have been for nothing!
Will you look at me when I'm talking to you?
translation.ko: 제가 얘기할 땐 절 좀 봐요!

translation.en: Camilla, how can I sell my Cornish biscuits as organic
translation.ko: 커밀라, 내 코니시 비스킷을 카펫에 쏟아 버리면

translation.en: now they've been on the carpet?
Nobody will give a fuck about your Cornish biscuits,
translation.ko: 당신이 왕이 되지 못하면 그 비스킷에는

translation.en: if you're not going to be king.
Of course they will, they're delicious, nutritious
and all the biscuity profits go to charity.
There wouldn't be any profits if people knew
they were made by seven-year-old orphans with Rickets.
What happens in the Duchy of Cornwall, stays in the Duchy of Cornwall.
translation.ko: 내 영지에서 일어나는 일은 거기에 묻혀야 해

translation.en: Where are the Garibaldis? Ah.
[sighing] Christ!
[Wills] That was tremendous, Kate.
Are you all right? Oh, it's nothing, Wills.
It's just, well, sometimes I feel like I don't belong in this family.
translation.ko: 그냥, 내가 이 가족의 일원이 아닌 것 같을 때가 있어

translation.en: What are you talking about?
Marrying you was the best decision I ever made.
Even though I'm a gypsy? Because you're a gypsy.
But are you sure your family are all right with it?
translation.ko: 당신 가족들도 정말 괜찮을까? 아주 좋아해 다만, 난 개인적으로

translation.en: They're thrilled.
Although, personally, I do wish
translation.ko: 아주 좋아해 다만, 난 개인적으로 당신이 버려진 가전을 주워 오지 않았으면 해

translation.en: you didn't bring back quite so many dumped white goods.
translation.ko: 당신이 버려진 가전을 주워 오지 않았으면 해

translation.en: That's 12 quid's worth of copper in there.
[clock chimes] Oh, is that the time? I need to be at the caff.
translation.ko: 벌써 시간이 됐나? 식당에 가야 해

translation.en: I'm mingling amongst my subjects to find out what they truly want.
translation.ko: 국민들 틈에 섞여 뭘 원하는지 알아보고 있어

translation.en: And what do they want? Usually double egg and chips.
If I must be King, I'm determined to be the best one I can be.
translation.ko: 꼭 왕이 돼야 한다면 최고의 왕이 되기로 했어

translation.en: And you will be.
I just wish there were a role for me.
translation.ko: 다만 내가 할 일도 있으면 좋겠어

translation.en: But what you do is vital.
translation.ko: 당신은 애들을 기르잖아 그것도 중요한 일이야

translation.en: Bringing up children.
translation.ko: 당신은 애들을 기르잖아 그것도 중요한 일이야 해리가 자선 가장무도회를 준비하는 걸 도우면 되지

translation.en: You could help Harry with his upcoming fancy dress, charity ball.
translation.ko: 해리가 자선 가장무도회를 준비하는 걸 도우면 되지

translation.en: You'll be invaluable to him, what with being able to read and write.
translation.ko: 읽고 쓸 수 있으니까 큰 도움이 될 거야

translation.en: Oh, that's a great idea.
Hey, don't you have to be at the caff?
I'm allowed three verbal warnings, and I've only had two. Hmmm.
translation.ko: 구두 경고 3번까지 봐주는데 아직 2번밖에 안 받았어

translation.en: I'm just saying, I think the Royal family are a complete waste of money.
translation.ko: 솔직히 왕족을 유지하는 건 완전히 돈 낭비라고 봐

translation.en: No, hang on a minute there, Alec, I think they do a very good job.
translation.ko: 잠깐만, 앨릭, 난 왕족들이 잘하고 있다고 생각해

translation.en: They bring in £500 million a year, just from tourism alone.
I think they're tremendous value for money.
Well, I suppose you're right.
Hey, Billy. You clean bog now.
It's the London air ambulance.
We had to make a crash landing.
One of the crew has Munchausen syndrome by proxy.
-But isn't that where you harm other people? -Yes, he poisoned the pilot.
translation.ko: 그건 남을 다치게 하는 거 아닌가요? 맞아요, 파일럿을 중독시켰죠

translation.en: But we can still make it if someone can fly a helicopter.
translation.ko: 하지만 누군가 헬리콥터를 조종할 수 있다면 갈 수 있어요

translation.en: [thinking] I can fly a helicopter. But if I make myself known, I'll blow my cover.
translation.ko: 헬리콥터를 몰 수 있지만 그걸 밝히면 신분이 탄로 나

translation.en: Quickly! We've got a patient who's seriously ill,
also with Munchausen syndrome by proxy.
Won't he be all right, then? He'll be the one poisoning other people.
translation.ko: 그럼 괜찮겠네요 남을 다치게 하는 병이니까 참, 대리인에 의한 게 아니라 그냥 뮌하우젠 증후군이에요

translation.en: Sorry, it's not by proxy, he's just got Munchausen syndrome.
translation.ko: 참, 대리인에 의한 게 아니라 그냥 뮌하우젠 증후군이에요 그렇군요

translation.en: -Gotcha. -That makes sense.
Billy! I said bog now. Is big shit in bog. It's no flush.
translation.ko: 빌리, 화장실 청소하라니까! 큰 똥이 안 내려가!

translation.en: I can fly a helicopter.
You? But you're just a bloke who works in a caff.
translation.ko: - 제가 몰 수 있습니다 - 당신이요? 그냥 식당 직원인데 어떻게 헬리콥터를 몰죠?

translation.en: How can you fly a helicopter?
translation.ko: 그냥 식당 직원인데 어떻게 헬리콥터를 몰죠?

translation.en: Because I am Prince William.
Second in line to the throne.
Husband to a gypsy.
Closely related to Kaiser Wilhelm of Germany, who started World War I.
translation.ko: 1차 세계대전을 일으킨 독일 빌헬름 황제와 관계가 깊죠

translation.en: Billy, what we do about shit?
Now, where are the keys?
Thanks.
Pippa!
-How great to see you. -Hiya, you look fantastic.
translation.ko: 피파, 정말 반갑다 안녕? 좋아 보이네

translation.en: Ooh, I couldn't have some money, could I?
translation.ko: 혹시 돈 좀 줄 수 있을까?

translation.en: Pippa, what happened to the £400,000 you got for your party planning book?
translation.ko: 피파, 파티 준비 책 쓴다고 가져간 40만 파운드는?

translation.en: -I spent it. -What on?
Getting fucked up. So... I'm sorry, but no.
translation.ko: - 망하는 데, 그러니... - 미안하지만 안 돼

translation.en: What?
translation.ko: 뭐? 너도 스스로 서는 법을 배워야 해

translation.en: You've got to learn to stand on your own two feet.
translation.ko: 너도 스스로 서는 법을 배워야 해

translation.en: Like you did? Parading around in your pants at a university fashion show,
translation.ko: 언니처럼 미래의 영국 왕이 프러포즈할 때까지

translation.en: until the future King of England proposes?
You weren't there. It was nothing like that.
translation.ko: 넌 거기 없었잖아 그런 게 아니었어

translation.en: Oh, fuck off, it was in a book.
So are you going to give me some money, or not?
translation.ko: 돈 줄 거야, 말 거야? 알겠어, 하지만 5천 파운드밖에 못 줘

translation.en: All right. But I'm afraid all I can spare is £5,000.
That won't even buy lunch. Why don't you sell one of these paintings?
translation.ko: 그건 점심값도 안 돼 이 그림들 중 하나를 팔지 그래?

translation.en: Pippa, we don't own those paintings.
We're merely custodians of them for the public.
But they don't get to see them very often, do they?
translation.ko: 근데 대중은 이 그림을 자주 못 보지

translation.en: You really think you're it, don't you?
translation.ko: 언니가 진짜 대단한 사람이 된 것 같지?

translation.en: Well, I remember when you were fighting Rottweilers
translation.ko: 난 언니가 모리슨즈 주차장에서 로트바일러랑 싸운 걸 기억해

translation.en: -in Morrison's car park. -So do I.
translation.ko: 난 언니가 모리슨즈 주차장에서 로트바일러랑 싸운 걸 기억해 246번 싸워서 다 이겼지 난 집시인 게 자랑스러워

translation.en: 246 fights, 246 knockouts. See, I'm proud of being a gypsy.
translation.ko: 246번 싸워서 다 이겼지 난 집시인 게 자랑스러워

translation.en: Well, I'm not. I tarmacked my last drive
the day I walked up the steps of Westminster Abbey
translation.ko: 웨스트민스터 사원의 계단을 오르던 날에 드디어

translation.en: and the world finally woke up to the fact that I've got a fantastic arse.
translation.ko: 내 엉덩이가 근사하다는 걸 세상이 알아줬거든

translation.en: It's true, you do have a fantastic arse.
But all you do is sit on it.
I just wish you had what I have.
translation.ko: 내가 가진 게 네게도 있으면 좋겠어 모두가 왕자와 결혼할 수는 없잖아?

translation.en: We can't all go off and marry a prince, can we?
You're right. I'm sorry.
translation.ko: 언니 말이 맞아, 미안해 내가 좀 지나쳤어

translation.en: -I went too far. -I'm sorry too. Hug?
translation.ko: 언니 말이 맞아, 미안해 내가 좀 지나쳤어 나도 미안해, 포옹할까?

translation.en: And it is time I got on with some real work.
translation.ko: 나도 제대로 일할 때가 된 것 같아

translation.en: [Harry] Oh, yeah!
Oh, yeah! Oh, yeah!
Oh, yeah! Oh, yeah! Incoming!
That was awesome.
Right, so where's this airfix model of a Lancaster bomber you've made, then?
translation.ko: 좋아, 당신이 만들었다는 랭커스터 폭격기 모형은요?

translation.en: I've got a little confession to make, Harry.
I didn't make an airfix model of a Lancaster bomber.
translation.ko: 전 랭커스터 폭격기의 모형을 만들지 않았어요

translation.en: -Have I been very naughty? -No.
translation.ko: 너무 제멋대로였나요? 아니요, 하지만 이건 이번 한 번으로 끝나야 해요

translation.en: But, er this, it has to be a one-off.
translation.ko: 아니요, 하지만 이건 이번 한 번으로 끝나야 해요

translation.en: Oh, really? Why?
translation.ko: 진짜요? 왜요? 전 아직 크레시다를 사랑하니까요

translation.en: Because I'm still in love with Cressida.
But that's Chelsea.
Is it? Well, one of them, anyway.
Okay.
We'll have to see about that, won't we?
That is a fantastic arse.
Oh, my God.
If only I could read!
That was a blinding lobster Thermidor, Beatrice.
A bit pricey, though. And we've had another rent demand.
translation.ko: 좀 비싸긴 하지만 우리 집세도 내야 하잖아

translation.en: I can't believe the government's made us start paying rent
for our Chelsea penthouse when we do so much for the country.
translation.ko: 우리보고 첼시 펜트하우스의 집세를 내라고 하지?

translation.en: Yeah, that is a big chunk of wedge
translation.ko: 그러게 어딘가에서 그 돈을 마련해야 할 텐데

translation.en: we're going to have to find from somewhere.
translation.ko: 어딘가에서 그 돈을 마련해야 할 텐데

translation.en: Eugenie... We're going to have to get jobs.
Is that like when Daddy has a party for Arabs and British businessmen?
translation.ko: 아빠가 아랍과 영국 사업가들의 파티를 여는 것처럼?

translation.en: No. I think a job is where you have to go into a building, or something.
translation.ko: 아니, 일을 하려면 건물 같은 데를 들락거려야 해

translation.en: -Oh. -Hey, we could work for ourselves.
-Ooh, I like it, but doing what? -Well, what are our skills?
translation.ko: - 좋아, 근데 뭘 할까? - 우린 어떤 기술이 있지?

translation.en: I wear make-up.
I have an iPhone.
We could become online make-up tip girl sensations.
translation.ko: 온라인 메이크업 강좌로 인기를 끄는 거야

translation.en: -I fucking love that idea. -And we'll make it on our own,
without using any royal associations whatsoever.
translation.ko: 이용하지 않고 우리 힘으로 하는 거야

translation.en: Let's launch it at Harry's ball at Buckingham Palace.
translation.ko: 버킹엄 궁전에서 열리는 해리의 무도회에서 시작하자

translation.en: Bangies!
Oh, Kate, you're an absolute life-saver.
Oh, honestly, it's you doing me a favor by helping me find a role.
translation.ko: 솔직히 제게 할 일을 준 당신이 절 도운 거예요

translation.en: So, where are we?
translation.ko: 어디까지 준비됐죠? 아직 좌석 배치를 하고 있었어요

translation.en: Oh, I was just doing the seating plan.
Oh, yeah, I got distracted when an aeroplane flew over
and I tried to draw it.
But aeroplanes are always flying over. I know.
So, what's this ball in aid of? I don't know.
-And when is it? -Don't know.
Ah! Friday. -We'd better get stuck in. -Ah, got you.
Mummy! Hello, girls.
You're in a good mood.
Oh, my God. This hasn't happened in yonks Just got recognized.
translation.ko: 세상에, 정말 오랜만에 사람들이 날 알아봤어

translation.en: -Oh, brilliant. -Yeah! I mean, they thought I was Mick Hucknall,
translation.ko: 굉장해요 날 믹 헉널로 착각하긴 했지만

translation.en: but you know, it's close enough.
Have you heard about Harry's fancy dress ball?
Yeah, it's going to be amaze.
I mean, I'd love to go, but Prince Philip's ordered MI6
translation.ko: 나도 가고 싶은데 그 궁전의 8km 이내로 접근하면

translation.en: to assassinate me if I go within five miles of a palace.
translation.ko: 날 사살하라고 필립 왕자가 MI6에 명령했잖아

translation.en: Don't worry, Mummy, we'll get you in.
Oh, thanks, girls.
I mean, I hate to ask, but I do miss the old days, you know,
translation.ko: 부탁하기는 싫지만 옛날이 그리워서 새벽까지 춤도 추고 모든 게 공짜지

translation.en: dancing till dawn, everything free.
translation.ko: 새벽까지 춤도 추고 모든 게 공짜지

translation.en: Whereas, in the Wetherspoons, it's £2.50 a pint
and chucking out at 11.
No, no, table 5.
[whispering] I owe Paolo money. Last time I was here, I did a runner.
translation.ko: 파울루에게 빚진 게 있어 전에 왔을 때 먹고 튀었거든

translation.en: Poor Mummy.
Yes, I've been made a patron of the BFI.
translation.ko: 그래, 영국 영화 협회의 홍보 대사가 됐다

translation.en: I mean, I always thought I knew a lot about film, but this proves it.
translation.ko: 내가 영화를 잘 안다고 생각했는데 그게 증명된 거지

translation.en: Now then, Kate, a little bird tells me
translation.ko: 그건 그렇고, 케이트 소문을 듣자 하니

translation.en: that you're helping Harry with the fancy dress ball.
Yes. It's terribly hard work, but tremendously fulfilling.
translation.ko: 네, 정말 힘들긴 하지만 성취감이 커요

translation.en: It's silly, but at last I feel like...
Go on, dear. ...I belong.
I'm so sorry. [laughing] Something went down the wrong hole.
As per last night, for which I apologize.
Is there anything I can do to help?
I mean, no-one would expect a girl of your upbringing to know,
for instance, that fish is served with white wine, rather than Diamond White.
translation.ko: 싼 사과주 말고 화이트와인을 곁들인다는 걸 알까 싶어서

translation.en: I judge people by the content of their character,
not by the alcohol content of their cider.
Oh, I've offended you. I'm so sorry, I had no intention.
translation.ko: 내가 기분을 상하게 했네 미안, 고의는 아니었어

translation.en: And I can see that you too like Diamond White, ultra-strong.
translation.ko: 하지만 너도 아주 독한 사과주 같구나

translation.en: Sorry I'm late, but I've had the most incredible day.
translation.ko: 늦어서 죄송해요 하지만 최고로 멋진 하루였어요

translation.en: Looks like someone sold a lot of pies.
No, I've come to a decision. I want to be a pilot again.
translation.ko: 아니요, 저 결심했어요 다시 파일럿이 되고 싶어요

translation.en: What? Like a common tradesman?
This isn't the Dutch Royal Family, this is the real thing.
translation.ko: 우린 네덜란드 왕족이 아니라 진짜 왕족이야

translation.en: I just want to help people.
Then do it by doing what you've been trained to do, waving.
translation.ko: 네가 훈련받은 것으로 도와 손을 흔드는 것 말이다

translation.en: What was the point in learning to fly a helicopter
if I'm forbidden from doing it?
So you could wear a uniform at your wedding.
It's not enough for me, Father.
From now on, the only time you're allowed in a helicopter
translation.ko: 이제부터 네가 헬리콥터에 타도 되는 건

translation.en: is when you're going to an exclusive Caribbean island
translation.ko: 왕실 전용 카리브해 섬이나 스티븐 프라이의

translation.en: or Stephen Fry's birthday party.
-But my mind is made up. -And so is mine!
-How was the caff? -Terrible.
All I want to do is fly helicopters, but, instead,
translation.ko: 난 헬리콥터를 몰고 싶은데 대신 온종일

translation.en: I spent all day explaining why I've got a dead rat in the sink. Oh!
translation.ko: 왜 싱크대에 죽은 쥐가 있는지 설명했거든

translation.en: So, aren't you going to get ready?
-Hmm? -Wills, have you forgotten what tonight is?
No. Happy Michaelmas.
-It's our date night. -Oh... Yeah, can we skip it?
translation.ko: 데이트하기로 했잖아 그러네, 건너뛰면 안 돼?

translation.en: Wills, I've been working hard too, you know,
trying to book a band for Harry's ball,
but none of the trendy ones want to be associated with the Royal family.
translation.ko: 요즘 인기 많은 밴드들은 왕실과 얽히기 싫어해

translation.en: Ed Sheeran told me to go and fuck myself.
translation.ko: 에드 시런은 나보고 가서 자위나 하라더라

translation.en: At the moment, all I have is Ronan Keating.
translation.ko: 지금 섭외가 된 건 로넌 키팅뿐이야

translation.en: Oh, darling, I'm so sorry.
Oh, there's the baby-sitter.
I'm not sure I even want to go out now. Perhaps I'll tell him to go.
translation.ko: 나갈 기분도 아닌데 그분을 돌려보낼까 봐

translation.en: -No, we could both do with a night out. -Thanks.
Hang on, "him"?
Thanks so much for this.
Uncle Edward, why are you baby-sitting?
translation.ko: 에드워드 숙부님 숙부님이 왜 아이를 봐요?

translation.en: I won't lie, Wills,
translation.ko: 거짓말은 하지 않겠다, 윌스 곤경에 처했어

translation.en: -I'm in the soup. -What's happened?
translation.ko: 거짓말은 하지 않겠다, 윌스 곤경에 처했어 - 무슨 일이에요? - 먼저 한잔해도 될까?

translation.en: Any chance of a drink first?
Well, I'm not sure, you know, if you're looking after the children.
Yes, quite right.
-Just out of curiosity, where would you keep it? -Uncle Edward!
translation.ko: 궁금해서 그러는데 술은 어디에다 둬? 에드워드 숙부님

translation.en: You know how I live for show business?
translation.ko: 내가 쇼 비즈니스로 어떻게 사는지 아니?

translation.en: Well, I recently bought the rights to Oliver Twist
and turned it into a musical.
But that's been done, it was called Oliver.
Well, I know that now.
But when I went back to the pub, the man had gone.
Anyway, long story short, I need to find £6 million fast.
We only pay £5 an hour.
That's all right. I'm going to stuff envelopes while I'm here.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 여기 있는 동안 봉투를 채울 거거든

translation.en: Look, I've even got a business plan.
Just a second, Uncle Edward.
Darling, are you sure about this?
Uncle Edward is a nice bloke and everything, but come on.
translation.ko: 에드워드 숙부님은 좋은 분이지만 조지와 샬럿은 우리만의 애들이 아니야

translation.en: George and Charlotte aren't just our babies,
they are the people's babies.
But everyone deserves a second chance.
translation.ko: 하지만 누구에게나 두 번째 기회가 필요해

translation.en: You and your gypsy code.
Okay, Uncle Edward, you're on.
Oh, right, right, off you go then, have a good time.
translation.ko: 그럼 어서 가 보렴 즐거운 시간 보내라

translation.en: And don't worry, we'll be fine.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마 아무 일 없을 테니까

translation.en: Someone was asking me today if, by some miracle,
translation.ko: 오늘 누가 묻더라고요 만약 우리에게 아이가 있다면

translation.en: we had a child, where it would stand in the line of succession.
translation.ko: 오늘 누가 묻더라고요 만약 우리에게 아이가 있다면 그 애의 왕위 계승 서열이 어떻게 되냐고요

translation.en: And I had no idea.
Well, it's a bit unlikely, isn't it, darling?
translation.ko: 그럴 리가 없잖아, 여보 당신은 '왬'이 해체한 후 월경을 안 했는걸

translation.en: You haven't had a period since Wham! split up!
translation.ko: 당신은 '왬'이 해체한 후 월경을 안 했는걸

translation.en: [laughing] You are funny. Yes, but hypothetically.
Well, it'd be me, William, George, Charlotte, Harry
translation.ko: 그럼 나, 윌리엄 조지, 샬럿, 해리

translation.en: and then whatever homunculus came out of you.
So, only six fools stand in the way of the Parker Bowles dynasty.
translation.ko: 파커볼스가의 왕이 나오려면 바보 6명만 제치면 되네

translation.en: Welcome to Royal Make-up Tips, with Bea and E.
translation.ko: B 그리고 E와 함께하는 왕실 메이크업입니다

translation.en: Today we're going to teach you how to make yourself look like a tiger.
translation.ko: 오늘은 호랑이처럼 보이는 화장법을 알려 드릴게요

translation.en: So, that's the concept. What do you think?
If you're there, how can you be here as well?
translation.ko: 너희가 저기 있는데 어떻게 여기에도 있는 거야?

translation.en: Never mind that. Can we launch it at your ball?
translation.ko: 그건 됐고, 오빠 무도회에서 시작해도 돼?

translation.en: Of course you can, girls.
Great. And one more favor. Can Mummy come to your ball too?
translation.ko: 부탁이 하나 더 있어 엄마도 무도회에 와도 돼?

translation.en: Oh, Granddad wrote me a letter about that.
translation.ko: 할아버지가 그 문제에 대해 편지를 보내셨는데

translation.en: Ummm, maybe you could read it for me.
"Dear Harry, Please find enclosed a £10 WH Smith voucher for your birthday."
Oh, ace!
"PS, under no circumstance can your fucking Aunt Fergie
translation.ko: '추신, 어떤 상황에서도' '퍼기 숙모는 무도회에 오지 못하게 해라'

translation.en: come to your fucking ball. She's a fucking liability.
translation.ko: '퍼기 숙모는 무도회에 오지 못하게 해라' '퍼기는 골칫거리니까'

translation.en: So if she asks to come, tell her to fuck right off. Love, Granddad."
Oh, sorry, girls.
Let's go to Boujis.
-Mummy's got to get into that ball. -You're right.
-Let's go to Boujis. -Yeah.
What a magical evening. Yeah. You can't beat Pizza Express.
translation.ko: - 정말 멋진 저녁이었어 - 피자 익스프레스는 끝내주지

translation.en: The best bit was when you lied
and said it was your birthday to get a free cake.
translation.ko: 당신이 공짜 케이크 먹으려고 생일이라고 속인 게 최고였어

translation.en: Shh, someone might hear. I'll check on the kids.
-Had a good time? -Wonderful.
Everything all right here?
Not a peep and I've stuffed over 200 envelopes.
translation.ko: 아무 일도 없었어 봉투 200장도 다 채웠고

translation.en: Well done, Uncle Edward. I'm very proud of you.
Thanks.
Anyway, that's five hours at five quid an hour, so that's...
£25. Plus tip, that's up to you.
Uncle Edward, have you been letting little George operate a lathe?
translation.ko: 숙부님, 조지가 절단기를 갖고 놀게 하셨어요? 문제라도 있니?

translation.en: -Is there a problem? -He's been making metal spikes, they were all covered in jagged edges.
translation.ko: 금속 못을 만들고 있어요 모서리가 삐죽삐죽해요

translation.en: -He can't do it perfectly his first time. -What were you thinking of?
translation.ko: 처음부터 완벽할 순 없어 대체 왜 그러셨어요?

translation.en: Pardon me for trying to give him something to fall back on.
translation.ko: 만약에 대비해 기술을 익히게 해 미안하다

translation.en: Well, he's going to be the King.
But what if there's a republic?
Then he'll become a Fulham-based estate agent, like everyone else we know.
translation.ko: 그럼 우리가 아는 사람들처럼 풀럼의 부동산 중개인이 되겠죠

translation.en: Well, don't worry about the tip then.
I'm going now.
You are coming to the ball tonight, aren't you?
translation.ko: 당신도 오늘 밤에 무도회에 올 거지?

translation.en: Of course I am.
Seriously, Wills, this is important to me,
so don't say it if you don't mean it.
I mean it with all my heart.
Nothing's going to stop me getting to that ball.
-So I'll see you at the ball then. -[mobile ringing]
Hello?
Wills, I need you to fly the air ambulance.
We've had three pilots go down sick, it's this damn Munchhausen's.
But I've just promised Kate I'd be at her ball.
God dammit, a man has collapsed on a pedalo in Hyde Park.
I've got no-one else to call. You're his last hope.
translation.ko: 연락할 곳이 없어! 자네가 마지막 희망이야!

translation.en: I need to think. I'll call you back.
But...
On the one hand, I'll be defying my father
translation.ko: 지금 가면 아버지의 뜻을 거역하는 거고

translation.en: and, what's worse, breaking a promise to the woman I love.
translation.ko: 사랑하는 여자와 한 약속을 어기게 돼 하지만 안 가면 사람이 죽을 수도 있어

translation.en: On the other, a man could die.
translation.ko: 하지만 안 가면 사람이 죽을 수도 있어

translation.en: What would you do, King Alfred the Great?
That's quite a dilemma, young man.
But when the life of one of your subjects is in danger,
translation.ko: 하지만 네 국민의 목숨이 위험한 상황이라면

translation.en: the choice is obvious.
Of course, the pedalo man needs me.
Oh, thanks, Alfred the Great, you know everything.
translation.ko: 감사합니다, 대왕님 역시 모든 걸 아시네요

translation.en: Yes, except when to take the cakes off the fire.
translation.ko: 그래, 케이크를 언제 오븐에서 꺼내야 하는지만 빼고

translation.en: -Wills! -On my way.
Oh, thank God you're here.
translation.ko: 와 주셔서 다행이에요 고기 파이 6개를 먹었는데

translation.en: I just had six pork pies. I'm slipping into a diabetic coma.
translation.ko: 와 주셔서 다행이에요 고기 파이 6개를 먹었는데 당뇨병성 혼수상태에 빠졌죠

translation.en: Okay, what's your name? Everyone calls me Fat Twat.
Okay, Fat Twat, I'm Wills. We're going to get through this.
translation.ko: 바보 뚱보 씨, 전 윌스예요 우린 무사할 거예요

translation.en: Oh, it's Type 2 diabetes,
the self-inflicted sort.
translation.ko: 2형 당뇨병이에요 제가 자초한 일이죠 기본적인 식욕을 통제하지 못해요

translation.en: I can't control my basic appetites.
Look, I'm even eating a pie now.
All right, Fat Twat, the important thing is that we get you to a hospital.
translation.ko: 바보 뚱보 씨, 중요한 건 병원에 가는 거예요

translation.en: Oh, I'm drifting.
Stay with me, Fat Twat. I'm not going to lose you.
translation.ko: 정신 차려요, 바보 뚱보 씨 전 포기하지 않아요!

translation.en: Oh, I can see a cake, big cake.
Stay away from the cake!
-Knock, knock. -Camilla.
Who have you come as?
Cheryl Cole.
[imitating Cheryl] You're my little star and I thoroughly enjoyed it.
translation.ko: 당신은 저의 작은 스타예요 그리고 정말 즐거웠어요

translation.en: [laughing] That's just like her.
Thank you. And what are you going to wear tonight?
I'm going as Princess Leia.
Don't you like it?
No, it's just, well, since Disney bought the Star Wars franchise,
they're really playing hardball over the fancy dress costumes.
translation.ko: 가장무도회 복장에 대해 규제를 심하게 하잖니

translation.en: I can't risk a legal battle with Disney.
translation.ko: 디즈니와 법적 분쟁을 할 순 없는데, 어쩌죠?

translation.en: -What will I do? -I might be able to help.
translation.ko: 디즈니와 법적 분쟁을 할 순 없는데, 어쩌죠? 내가 도와줄 수 있어

translation.en: I brought a spare costume, just in case, for myself,
translation.ko: 만약에 대비해서 의상을 하나 더 가져왔는데

translation.en: -but, you can have it. -Really?
translation.ko: 네가 입도록 해 정말요? 저희가 늘 잘 맞진 않았지만 감사해요, 뭔데요?

translation.en: I know we haven't always seen eye to eye, but thank you.
translation.ko: 정말요? 저희가 늘 잘 맞진 않았지만 감사해요, 뭔데요?

translation.en: -What is it? -Let's just say it's nautical but nice.
translation.ko: 정말요? 저희가 늘 잘 맞진 않았지만 감사해요, 뭔데요? 바다와 관련된 거야, 근사하단다

translation.en: You'll cause quite the sensation.
-And it's just you two? -Definitely.
Right, in you go.
-We're in. -Great. Time to do what I do best,
drink four bottles of Chablis and flash my freckly bangs.
translation.ko: 샤블리 4병 마시고 내 몸을 보여 주는 것

translation.en: Yay! Go, Mummy!
Oh, Harry, I didn't know you'd be here.
translation.ko: 해리, 당신이 여기에 있을 줄은 몰랐네요

translation.en: -Oh, well, it's my ball. -Of course it is.
Unfortunately, my magic powers don't extend to conjuring up a drink.
translation.ko: 안타깝게도 제 마법으로 술을 만들진 못하나 봐요

translation.en: -Eh? -Buy me a drink.
Oh, of course, yeah. Two pints of Stella, please. You, Pippa?
-The same. -Yeah, make it four.
translation.ko: 같은 거요 2리터요, 케이트 말로는 돈이 부족하다면서요, 여기요

translation.en: Oh, Kate mentioned you're a bit short at the mo, so... Here you are.
What's that?
It's a cheque for 100,000 quid, well, any amount you like, really,
translation.ko: - 뭐예요? - 10만 파운드 수표예요 빈칸으로 뒀으니 필요한 만큼 알아서 써요, 난 못 쓰잖아요

translation.en: I left it blank. I can't write.
translation.ko: 빈칸으로 뒀으니 필요한 만큼 알아서 써요, 난 못 쓰잖아요

translation.en: You'd do that for me?
-Harry, I don't know what to... -Ooh, there's Chelsea.
-That's Cressida. -Yeah, that's what I said. Laters.
This is the best hospital in London, Fat Twat.
translation.ko: 여긴 런던 최고의 병원이에요, 바보 뚱보 씨

translation.en: And remember, it's the Mediterranean diet for you from now on.
Too right! It'll be pizza and ice cream all the way!
Mission accomplished.
translation.ko: 임무 완료, 해리와 케이트의 무도회로 경로 변경

translation.en: Setting course for Harry and Kate's charity ball.
translation.ko: 임무 완료, 해리와 케이트의 무도회로 경로 변경 연료가 부족할 거야 기지로 복귀해!

translation.en: You don't have the fuel. Return to base, return to base!
I've got a promise to keep!
I don't need fuel. This chopper is going to be flying on love.
translation.ko: 연료는 필요 없어요 이 헬기는 사랑으로 가니까

translation.en: We've done some calculations this end and it might just work.
translation.ko: 이런 결말을 예상해 준비했으니 아마 가능할 거야

translation.en: Good luck.
Come on, my dear.
The ball is a roaring success and it's all thanks to you.
translation.ko: 무도회가 성황을 이루고 있어 다 네 덕분이야

translation.en: I know. Wills promised me he'd be here.
Come on, old girl, almost there. Don't give up on me now!
translation.ko: 제발 힘을 내! 여기서 멈추면 안 돼!

translation.en: Wills!
Okay. I'll just have to glide her in.
Tricky with no wings, but here goes.
Steady!
Steady! -Steady. -Wills!
He made it.
I must get dressed.
What the hell do you think you're doing?
I thought I made my views on helicopters quite clear.
translation.ko: 헬리콥터에 대한 내 입장을 밝혔잖니 전 제 인생을 살아야 해요

translation.en: I have to live my own life.
Your destiny has been set
since the first House of Windsor monkey swung down from the trees.
translation.ko: 나무에서 내려온 순간부터 네 운명은 정해져 있었어

translation.en: You can't believe in evolution and the divine right of kings.
translation.ko: 진화론과 왕권신수설을 동시에 주장할 순 없어요

translation.en: I can believe what I damn well like. I've got nine degrees.
translation.ko: 나도 알 만큼 알아 학위가 9개나 있다고

translation.en: They're honorary degrees!
I've got the certificates!
Shiver me timbers, boys!
Well, what do you think?
What are you doing?
Don't you realize this is a fancy dress ball for military amputees?
translation.ko: 팔다리가 절단된 군인들을 위한 가장무도회인 거 몰라?

translation.en: [in a quivering voice] I was just trying to find a role.
[whispering] This could turn into a full-blown constitutional crisis.
I don't know what that means.
